title: Babolat Pure Drive 2021 Tennis Racket - 100 sq. in. Head Size
description: The Babolat Pure Drive 2021 Tennis Racket with a 100 sq. in. head size is designed for players seeking a powerful and responsive racket. Featuring the latest FSI Power technology, this racket enhances your game with a combination of power, control, and spin. The 16x19 string pattern and the modern blue and black design make it a visually striking and effective choice for players of all levels. Ideal for both recreational and competitive play, the Pure Drive 2021 offers a versatile performance for improving your game.
